FuncDef: This command specifies the time interval the tunnel group stays in the Discovery state. Interval-1 is used as discovery-interval when a new tunnel group is added to multi-chassis redundancy (mp-ipsec); interval-2 is used as the discovery interval at system boot up. It is optional and when it is not specified, interval-1 is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval in seconds. Values-1 to 1800 seconds.
